author: cnbc.com
title: BRIEF-Zuckerberg says Facebook deletions not a 'meaningful number'
text:
March 21 (Reuters) - Facebook Inc Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg spoke on Wednesday to the New York Times and to Wired Magazine.
* CEO MARK ZUCKERBERG SAYS HE HAS NOT SEEN A "MEANINGFUL NUMBER OF PEOPLE" DELETING ACCOUNTS -NYT
* ZUCKERBERG SAYS FACEBOOK NEEDS TO STAY "VERY CHEAP OR FREE"; "I DON'T THINK THE AD MODEL IS GOING TO GO AWAY" -NYT
* ZUCKERBERG SAYS FACEBOOK HAS FOUND NO LINK BETWEEN CAMBRIDGE ANALYTICA DATA AND RUSSIA'S INTERNET RESEARCH AGENCY -WIRED MAGAZINE
* ZUCKERBERG SAYS U.S. GOVERNMENT IN BEST POSITION TO INVESTIGATE POSSIBLE LINK; GOVERNMENT HAS GIVEN FACEBOOK "WARRANTS" -WIRED Further company coverage: (Reporting By David Ingram)
